title: How to Use KDSPY CORRECTLY for Niche Research
description:
Struggling to find profitable book niches on Amazon? You're not alone—KDP niche research can be confusing and overwhelming. In this video, I’ll show you the essential rules you must know when using KDSPY (PRO) so you can avoid wasted time, poor choices, and low book sales. Learn how to spot high-potential niches and make smarter publishing decisions in this 30 minute tutorial.
